name: Kelemeane Valley Demo
description:
Welcome to the glorious show of Kelemeane Valley!

We are looking for actors and actresses that can match the enthusiasm and brilliance of our cast, starring Patryk, Joseph, Roxanne, and lastly (with absolutely nobody else involved at all), Felicia!

Oh, and of course, yours truly, Isaac Wadsager! I've spent countless years arranging this show, and when it's finished, it will be- indisputably- the greatest, most impressive, emotional display of drama and tragedy the universe has ever seen!

Features

  • Visual novel made in the Renpy engine
  • ~20k words of dialogue, with a variety of choices and interactions
  • Original artwork and characters, drawn in beautiful black and white
  • Simple and nostalgic environment 

I hope you enjoy your time in Kelemeane Valley! There will be more to come... as long as you keep your nose clean and your concerns minimal.

If you find any misspellings or bugs, please let me know in the comments and I'll patch it as soon as possible. Your contributions as a player mean the world to me. Thank you! - MiscWorker
